title: Will Pokémon in Pokémon GO Scream if Within a Mile of a Sex Offender?
subtitle: A claim that the augmented reality game's "Pokémon" character will scream when within a mile of a sex offender came from a humor web site.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "Pokémon" in Pokémon GO will scream whenever a player is within one mile of a registered sex offender.
